title: New: GEMOLOGY – First & Last
body:
Get ready for all sorts of gem related puns when reading about Brooklyn duo **GEMOLOGY**.

Their sparkling debut offering, _First & Last_, combines all the best elements of late 80’s dream-pop, with a modern finish, more akin to the likes of Woman’s Hour or Fickle Friends. Check it out below.

excerpt.full: Get ready for all sorts of gem related puns when reading about Brooklyn duo GEMOLOGY. Their sparkling debut offering, First & Last, combines all the best elements of late 80’s dream-pop, with a modern finish, more akin to the likes of Woman’s Hour or Fickle Friends. Check it out below.
